Douglas Quaid.Action: Looks at wife quizzically after her casual, dismissive remark about his dreams.
Sits lost in thought, meditating on his wife's disdain and their strained relationship.
Kisses Kirsten's perfunctorily offered cheek before leaving.
Engages in conversation about future plans (trip to Mars) despite wife's skepticism.
Absorbed in newspaper, ignoring wife's comment about men and rape.
Proposes a bold plan to go to Mars, showing initiative and forward-thinking.
Dismisses civil unrest and political issues on Mars as media exaggeration, showing overconfidence or lack of situational awareness.
Quickly responds to the clock alert and prepares to leave for work, demonstrating basic responsibility and time awareness.
Fails to engage meaningfully with wife’s concerns about finances and his job performance.
Pauses to give a wad of notes to an aged violinist playing a plaintive tune.
Engages in friendly, familiar banter with the guard about forgetting his weapon and being frightened of it.
Gives money generously to the aged violinist but then walks on briskly without lingering.
Passes through the weapons check without a gun despite knowing it's required soon and chastised before.
Acknowledges the guard's warning without argument, defusing potential conflict.
Selects a 'NEW CAR' carriage on the train, possibly indicating awareness of environment.
Pays immediate attention to news mention of Mars, showing alertness and interest in relevant information.
Perks instantly at the mention of Mars, showing alertness and curiosity.
Tries to watch the broadcast despite physical obstruction, showing persistence and focus.
Watches the Rekall commercial through to the end but does not take it seriously and glances away, indicating some distraction or lack of engagement.
Pauses thoughtfully while typing at his computer and then continues, showing reflection and deliberate action.
Expresses amazement and curiosity about the Rekall experience.
Questions the safety and effectiveness of the memory implantation process.
Questions the effectiveness and safety of the memory implant process, showing critical thinking and caution.
Expresses amazement and surprise at the advanced technology and vivid presentations.
Expresses doubt and discomfort about the artificial nature of the Rekall experience, showing sincerity and vulnerability.
Considers the 'Intelligence Agent' identity despite potential dangers, indicating trust in the process and openness.
Shows hesitation and doubt about the reality and value of the implanted experience, questioning if it is all a fake.
Considers new identity options and seriously contemplates the consequences of choosing 'Intelligence Agent'.
Is thoughtful and open to persuasion, showing willingness to think critically about his options and what McClane says.
Tells Kirsten that watching an illegal film is illegal, showing disapproval with distaste.
Looks at Kirsten with distaste but then changes expression to one of resolve.
Looks at all the instrumentation with concern before the procedure, showing careful attention to details and cautiousness.
Shows resolve in response to Kirsten's provocations, indicating inner strength and determination.
Distracted and sitting uncomfortably while Kirsten watches a near-pornographic film, suggesting lack of focus or passivity in certain social situations.
Shows apprehension but cooperates with Lull's injection and procedure without resistance.
Eyes the hypodermic needle warily and shows apprehension before injection.
Nods in response to Lull's suggestions even as he is going under, showing limited conscious control.
Responds affirmatively and cooperatively to Lull's questions during memory implant procedure.
Remains largely passive during the procedure, following instructions without complaint.
Takes two disks and inserts them into a machine without hesitation.
Responds affirmatively and coherently to Sophie Lull's questions indicating focus and presence of mind.
Lies passively on the couch with eyes closed during memory implantation session, showing compliance rather than active control.
Adopts a cold and menacing demeanor, threatening those who broke his cover.
Engages in serious confrontations without friendliness or trust, instilling panic.
Maintains a cold, steely demeanor and reveals a menacing, flint-edged hardness indicating control and threat.
Threatens those who broke his cover and insists on silencing them, showing assertiveness and strategic awareness.
Does not reveal his true name, maintaining secrecy and control over the situation.
His voice trails off and his eyes close, showing a possible moment of vulnerability or fatigue.
Stumbles through a crowded foyer, oblivious to anything around him, showing disorientation and lack of awareness rather than engagement or friendliness.
Makes a phone call from a pocket phone while unaware of surroundings, no indication of interaction or warm behavior.
Appears dazed and disoriented, stumbles through lobby obliviously, uncomprehendingly looks out at the city.
Makes a phone call from a pocket phone despite confusion, slowly comes to senses in taxi.
Nods politely to the doorman upon entering the building.
Calls out for help to Mr. Zimmer when threatened by agents.
Becomes panicky and fearful when confronted by threatening men.
Expresses confusion and fear when confronted and physically intimidated by agents; is tearful and cringes in response to aggression.
Questions the agents about the fate of Rekall employees and his own situation, showing concern for others.
Hesitates to comply immediately, showing reluctance and assertiveness when forced into a car.
Hesitates before entering the car, shows fear and confusion, cringes and is tearful with fear when threatened and slapped.
Stops cringing and fear suddenly disappears, replaced by a thoughtful expression, indicating possible mental composure or strategic thinking.
Displays sudden violent aggression by incapacitating agents with lethal force.
Reacts with incredulity and detachment after violent actions, showing uncertainty about his own behavior.
Attempts to share his troubling and confusing memories with Kirsten despite her skepticism.
Strides into the bathroom and slams the door after an intense argument with Kirsten.
Uses strong language ('For fuck's sake') in response to Kirsten's concern for his wellbeing.
Attempts to calm himself with a hot compress in the bathroom, managing tension alone.
Releases Kirsten's arm and picks up the pistol after realizing the situation, shows initial restraint despite being stunned.
Expresses outrage and disbelief at Kirsten's betrayal after eight years.
Seeks explanation from Kirsten, displaying trust and hope in their shared past despite conflicting evidence.
Responds to the revelation that his life and memories are fabrications with confusion and existential questioning.
Addresses Kirsten with sarcastic remark 'No wonder you got the role as my bitchy wife -- type casting.'
Leaves the confrontation calmly without escalating conflict.
Mentally gropes frantically, struggling to figure out what to do next after a major revelation.
Attempts to leave and avoid confrontation after receiving unsettling information.
Walks briskly and tries to control his pace to avoid looking suspicious when leaving his apartment area.
Walks briskly out onto the street, controlling his pace, trying not to look suspicious.
Tries to blend in with other subway people and controls nervousness during weapons check.
Passes the weapons check successfully, with the guard pleased he remembered his gun.
Sits in the subway car looking confused and distraught, not knowing exactly where he will go.
Quickly hails a cab and jumps in to escape danger
Ducks to the floor to protect himself when gunfire erupts
Pushes cab door handle and rolls out unnoticed to safety
Offers the desk clerk a large bribe to bypass ID, downplays the clerk's casual attitude about infidelity, but does not engage or respond to the clerk's lewd comment, showing some discomfort.
Freezes upon hearing a threatening phone call and chooses not to hang up despite the warning, showing cautious engagement.
Crosses the road quickly and enters the hotel without hesitation.
Attempts to bribe the desk clerk to bypass ID verification confidently.
Shows distaste but remains silent when confronted by the desk clerk's sarcastic remarks.
Freezes and stares at the phone ringing before answering it after three rings.
Keeps the line open despite a threatening warning, showing guarded but cautious behavior.
Questions the mysterious caller and hesitates to trust him immediately.
Follows the caller's urgent advice to protect himself despite distrust.
Follows urgent instructions quickly (wraps wet towel around head to deaden bug signal).
Initially hesitant and questions trustworthiness of the caller.
Does not hang up the phone despite being threatened or stunned.
Is cautious and seeks confirmation by questioning the telephone voice about how they found him, showing awareness and vigilance.
Tries to recall his past and the connection with Scott Stevens, showing effort to piece together information despite memory gaps.
Relies on filtered telephone voice instructions to proceed, indicating some hesitation and dependence on external guidance.
Puts his hands together and greets passers-by Indian-style despite unusual appearance, showing friendly intent.
Spots and quickly identifies the 'FIRE EXIT' sign and races toward it.
Walks briskly through a public area with a towel around his head, calmly greeting passers-by Indian-style, suggesting situational awareness and composed behavior.
Examines the contents of the case with curiosity and whistles softly at the money.
Carefully examines the contents of the case, noting details such as the Martian money, passports, cassette recorder, and unusual items; shows curiosity and attention to detail.
Presses the conspicuous red button on the wristwatch without hesitation, indicating decisiveness and confidence.
Smiles bemusedly at his holographic duplicate before turning it off.
Follows instructions on a cassette tape to remove a monitoring device from his body carefully and without complaint.
Carefully removes transmitter by hiding it inside a rat trap without causing unintended harm or damage.
Exhibits strong instincts and well-trained reflexes despite memory suppression.
Memory is fractured and incomplete, causing confusion about true identity.
Uses a silver face mask and other disguises to alter appearance and evade detection.
Pauses thoughtfully when hearing the announcement and directs attention to the window to observe Mars with fascination.
Furrows brow as if trying to recall a deep hidden memory he can't quite remember.
Engages in casual, polite conversation and introduces himself with a handshake.
Tips the doorman politely before entering the hotel.
Acknowledges the clerk warmly and flattered when recognized.
Hesitates briefly before signing, attempting to maintain casual friendliness.
Politely accepts the item from the clerk when offered.
Looks through binoculars somewhat irritably then tosses them aside.
Approaches taxi stand properly attired, interacts with a friendly local (Bennie) hesitantly but without hostility.
Indicates the closer cab to Bennie and smiles approvingly, affirming Bennie's hustle.
Indicates the first cab in line as closer, showing decision-making in a social situation.
Smiles and agrees that Bennie out-hustles the first cabbie, demonstrating social awareness and tact.
Follows Bennie warily around a corner and gets into the solar car.
Walks toward Melina through the crowd despite being unnoticed, showing purposeful intent to reconnect.
Follows Melina into a dark billiard room after she pushes him away, showing persistence but potentially ignoring her emotional state.
Directly seeks out Melina Noel in a crowded bar, showing focus and purpose.
Follows Melina into a dark billiard room despite feeling bewildered, showing some hesitance and confusion.
Turns on the lights upon entering the billiard room, illuminating the area.
Stops in front of Melina, unsure what to do and shows uncertainty about his knowledge of her.
Is speechless and struggles to respond effectively after being slapped and confronted.
Attempts to cover his relief when Melina explains the note, showing some social adaptability.
Desperately tries to explain the situation and claim he does not have a wife, but his explanation is disjointed and unconvincing.
Tentatively puts his arms around Melina in a comforting gesture when she cries.
Begins to admit confusion about his own identity and mental state, openly seeking help.
Frantically pleads with Melina to remember their past and help him despite her rejection and tears.
Persistently tries to reconnect and appeal to Melina's love despite her clear refusal and hurt.
Becomes frantic and desperate, unable to recall important information about himself and fails to convince Melina, showing mental confusion and lack of control.
Recognizes his need for help and ultimately accepts Melina's rejection, choosing to leave without escalating the situation further.
Keeps his face in shadow and watches Cohaagen with curiosity as he passes.
Asks Bennie for information about the Sphinx despite Bennie's ignorance and reluctance to help.
Keeps his face in shadow and watches Cohaagen with curiosity as he passes.
Listens attentively to Edgemar's difficult explanation, remains engaged despite confusion and frustration.
Points gun at the door, showing distrust and coldness toward those trying to help him.
Expresses suspicion and cold stare at Edgemar despite their request to cooperate.
Points gun at the opening door upon suspicion, demonstrating alertness and quick reaction.
Expresses disbelief and suspicion toward Edgemar and Melina, showing critical thinking and cautiousness.
Wavers slightly when asked what will happen next, showing some uncertainty but maintains a cold stare, indicating controlled emotional response.
Refuses to blindly obey instructions, displaying a degree of independent judgment and assertiveness.
Internally becomes even more suspicious despite others' reassurances, which may help him avoid manipulation.
Trembling, holding a gun point blank at Edgemar's face, hesitating before pulling the trigger.
Pulls the trigger and shoots Edgemar, causing his death.
Holds gun trembling, hesitates but ultimately pulls the trigger on Edgemar despite high mental tension and confusion.
Struggles desperately to find what is true reality in a confusing and dangerous situation.
Returns fire quickly after being ambushed, showing immediate defensive response under pressure.
Falls to the floor and then staggers back, indicating vulnerability or loss of balance due to injury or surprise.
Quail shoots off the chain binding Melina to release her from danger.
Quail drags Melina by the wrist after entering his room, showing impatience or forcefulness.
Shoots off the chain restraining the explosive clipboard, takes control of a dangerous situation calmly.
Throws the explosive clipboard down the hallway, successfully using it as a weapon and triggering an explosion to his advantage.
Emerges from the explosion crouched and ready to shoot, showing tactical awareness and preparedness.
Shoots two enemies while dragging Melina to safety, effectively handling multiple threats simultaneously.
Icy-furious reaction after the explosion, immediately seizes Melina and moves to escape, showing quick decision-making under pressure.
Pours champagne for Melina despite tense situation, engages her with apology for lack of memory, showing concern.
Bundles waiter back into elevator unceremoniously, disregarding waiter's discomfort.
Bundles the waiter unceremoniously back inside the elevator and quickly presses the basement button, opening champagne and demanding answers, showing control of the situation.
Leaps aboard Bennie's solar car immediately to escape pursuers, reacting swiftly under pressure.
Aiming his gun at the following car, demonstrating readiness and calm in a dangerous situation.
Expresses uncertainty about why he is being targeted and cannot recall details about Melina, indicating gaps in knowledge.
Shouts a lighthearted remark to Bennie amidst gunfire, showing camaraderie and trust.
Looks at the group of men in the mine with amazement and curiosity.
Engages in friendly, informal conversation with Bennie and Melina, showing interest in their beliefs and activities.
Looks searchingly at Melina and Bennie, showing awareness and seeking understanding of their true affiliations.
Expresses amazement at the smoky gathering, indicating some surprise or lack of preparation for the underground resistance scene.
Exchanges friendly greetings with Melina and Bennie.
Expresses frustration and slumps into chair, showing vulnerability.
Jokes about arranging a return bout with Melina, showing lightheartedness.
Engages with the Martian Liberation Front members and tries to understand his role in the group despite memory gaps.
Acknowledges his memory loss and expresses frustration but continues to seek answers actively.
Questions the significance of the Sphinx, showing insight that it is important beyond surface appearance.
Slumps into a chair with frustration after not fully grasping his situation.
Grabs Melina and kisses her passionately, she responds warmly.
Displays skepticism and dismisses Kuato as a 'weirdo' quietly to Melina.
Grabs Melina and kisses her passionately, uses the moment to shield himself from the searchlight, showing situational awareness and confidence.
Expresses cynicism or dismissiveness toward Kuato by speaking sotto voce and questioning his usefulness, which may indicate skepticism but also a failure to recognize potential value immediately.
Hesitates before joining Kuato on the pillows, showing cautious respect.
Responds with surprise and disapproval at the idea of paying a fee, indicating sincerity and straightforwardness.
Hesitates before joining Kuato in the inner sanctum.
Engages in negotiation over the fee with Kuato rather than refusing outright.
Calculates the exchange rate to assess the price offered.
Agrees to pay a high price despite reservations about legality.
Maintains composure and openness during the Oracle Head's hypnotic and unsettling presence.
Passively receives briefings and does not exhibit immediate action or leadership in the excavation scene despite others being fearful.
Ignores fearful agents and enters the hidden chamber despite dangers, showing determination.
Dances with Melina, sharing a tender moment and lingering kiss before leaving reluctantly.
Battles three agents skillfully and violently when captured, using brutal force to defend himself.
Runs urgently through dangerous labyrinth tunnels while showing situational awareness by glancing back to assess threats.
Reaches out toward safety, indicating hope and will to survive despite fear and injury.
Suddenly jolts awake and appears white as a sheet and sweating, possibly showing vulnerability or physical weakness at that moment.
Rushes to check Kuato's condition and tries to find a last flicker of life, showing concern for a comrade despite tense circumstances.
Reaches out and gently closes the Oracle Head's eyelids after it dies, a tender gesture showing respect and care.
Ignores Bennie's question about the Oracle Head's message, focusing inwardly and distancing himself from others momentarily.
Quickly identifies that the Oracle Head is still alive by noticing the muffled choked sound and immediately rolls Kuato over to check.
Tries to revive Kuato by shaking him, showing concern and presence of mind.
Remains deep in thought over the Oracle Head's final message, indicating analytical and reflective capacity.
Does not immediately respond to Bennie's panicked question, focusing instead on the message, showing prioritization of information.
Does not outwardly panic or show confusion despite the stressful situation involving death and mystery.
Reassures Melina and Bennie by embodying confidence and leadership, takes charge of the situation.
brusquely questions Bennie about the depot and ignores his concerns.
Keeps moving forward with purpose despite others’ doubt and fear, implicitly inspiring trust.
Assumes the identity of Charles Hauser with forcefulness and purpose, demonstrating confidence and control.
Asks Bennie directly for the depot's location and quickly confirms ability to get there, showing decisiveness and planning.
Strides off with intention and the others follow, indicating leadership and confidence in direction.
States 'I've got total recall' after learning from the Oracle, suggesting he comprehends critical information quickly.
Ignores Bennie's warning about guards and danger, continuing with the plan without acknowledgement.
Mumbles to himself while cautiously and quickly inspecting vehicles as they try to approach the Sphinx.
Answers Melina's question patiently and explains the significance of the Sphinx and the machine.
Encourages Bennie to move the vehicle despite Bennie's nervousness.
Emerges with Melina cautiously after passing guards to ensure their safety.
Carefully inspects each vehicle rapidly but with attention to detail.
Leads group towards the specific vehicle needed for their mission, knowing its purpose.
Explains specialized knowledge about the Sphinx and its function clearly to others.
Emerges from the vehicle only after passing through guarded air lock unnoticed, showing cautious planning.
Explains the plan to terraform Mars to create a livable environment and expresses hope for a better future for all inhabitants
Acknowledges Melina's concerns and supports the resistance's cause against Cohaagen
Focuses on strategic sabotage of Cohaagen's plans rather than personal gain
Acknowledges he is the only one who can operate the terraforming machine, implying responsibility.
Smoothly explains his memory wipe was a temporary measure to Melina, indicating openness and calm reassurance.
Shows subtle skepticism when Bennie stops the vehicle and covers him with a pistol, indicating wariness and distrust.
Pounds Bennie's gun hand causing the pistol to be sucked out the vent, preventing harm to others.
Delivers a roundhouse punch to Bennie to neutralize a threat.
Lands a ferocious punch to Bennie to save Melina from being killed, risking the cabin's integrity and their own safety.
Dodges attacks from Bennie, shows resilience after being dazed
Recovers in time to land a precise and ferocious rabbit punch to Bennie's spine
Lunges and grabs Bennie's spinning blade weapon, uses it skillfully to sever Bennie's own oxygen line
Maintains composure and continues fighting under life-threatening conditions (vacuum of Mars drawing air out)
Does not panic or fail visibly despite being momentarily sprawled and dazed
Shouts encouragement to Melina, expresses hope he has the correct direction.
Comments ironically that it is a shame they won't get back out after a difficult trip.
Leads Melina through dangerous and challenging terrain confidently and without hesitation.
Leaps out of the mole drilling machine into a cramped tunnel and assesses the situation calmly.
Moves silently and close to the wall toward a lighted area, showing awareness and stealth.
Explains the mechanism of the main shaft and fusion reactors with confidence and understanding.
Climbs a dangerous ladder in a vast shaft without hesitation or fear.
Shows no visible signs of panic or confusion despite the overwhelming scale and danger of the situation.
Calmly reveals his presence to armed guards using a hologram trick, then swiftly disables them with non-lethal blows.
Takes cover upon seeing heavily armed guards, showing caution and situational awareness.
Creates a hologram distraction to mislead guards and then appears behind them to quickly incapacitate them with lightning blows.
Tosses Melina one of the Guard's guns after disarming foes.
Passes Melina a fresh ammo belt and asks if she knows how to use it.
Calls out 'Catch!' and throws an explosive device to protect himself and Melina from armed men.
Kills multiple guards to ensure their escape.
Shoots the security monitor to avoid being tracked, prioritizing their safety over confrontation.
Reassures Melina about the danger of heights and pulls her through the air lock despite looming threat.
Pulls Melina through the inner air lock door quickly to help her escape danger.
Climbs the Sphinx's shoulder and traverses dangerous heights wearing breathing apparatus, showing physical capability and focus.
Is the only one who can operate the Sphinx's controls, indicating unique skill and knowledge.
Approaches Melina less cautiously, beguiled by her manner and attractiveness, leading to being ambushed.
Pulls Melina back behind the stone cheeks to protect her from danger.
Hesitates and appears mesmerized facing complex control machinery, showing some uncertainty.
Jams grenades against the target’s eye, acts decisively in a dangerous environment, pulls Melina to safety, and engages the enemy.
Hesitates and seems unsure when first approaching the complex control panel, unsure about how to operate it despite the urgency.
Acknowledges a missing vital connection in the control panel and initiates action despite uncertainty, showing tentative technical insight.
Refuses Cohaagen's offer and asserts that those who ruined the old world don't deserve a new one, implying a desire for fairness and justice.
Reaches gently towards the panel, allowing a luminous hand to touch his fingers, showing a moment of connection and openness.
Engages in a physical struggle with Cohaagen after reaching for Melina, indicating protectiveness and willingness to defend others.
Struggles despite weakness, reaches for help from rescuers.
Looks up compassionately at the sky and shares the glance with Melina and others, indicating shared concern.
Clamps on his breathing mask quickly as explosions threaten around him, showing presence of mind under pressure.
Runs toward a brilliant white light despite fear and uncertainty, indicating determination but possibly lack of full situational awareness.
Falls to his knees, too weak to move, struggles but is physically overwhelmed.
Accepts help from miners calmly despite disorientation, showing ability to rely on others when necessary.
Removes breathing apparatus for himself and others, enabling them to breathe naturally.
Puts his arm around Melina and joins in singing the anthem with the group.
Removes breathing apparatus from another miner and then himself and Melina, demonstrating confidence in the environment and ability to assess safety.
Calmly explains the significance of the changing sky and the upcoming environmental transformation, showing understanding and foresight.
Encourages others by example; miners follow his lead removing masks, indicating his influence and leadership.

Douglas Quail.Action: Responds calmly when hit with a small sack and does not react aggressively.
